TopicTitle: Tune to play when you complete a contract

Articles.Content: I think it would be a nice touch to add a tune that plays in the same KSP style of music to play when you finish a contract, like when you reach 5000 meters it would play a nice tune, Good idea or not?
Hmm, maybe not a tune, but I think a nice little *Ding!* sound would do the job perfectly. Great idea!

I seek minecraft noteblock sounds like the legend of zelda or custom mp3 files of your own ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) probably ove rcomplicating my life (and the devs) but trust me Im an engineer. Or you can simply have notification thing on your phone.
Good idea, would add a more *SUCCESS!* feeling when you manage to complete it. Right now, it feels.. a little bland.
This sounds like a pretty cool addition to the Chatterer mod.

> 
> This sounds like a pretty cool addition to the Chatterer mod.

exactly what I was thinking!
That would be a nice small addition. Just a simple, short sound that lets you know you achieved the goals.

> 
> Like a cash register *cha-ching?*

Nah, more like a bell.

Good idea!
